      • isNeighbour

        public boolean isNeighbour(java.lang.String sourceCountry,
                           java.lang.String destCountry)
        The following method checks the countries passed in the forfeit phase are neighbour or not.
        Parameters:
        sourceCountry - The country from which armies have to moved.
        destCountry - The country which receives armies.
        Returns:
        returns true if both the countries are countries else it returns false.
